original_text: This phrase, “Yet once more,” indicates the removal of things that are shaken—that is, things that have been made—in order that the things that cannot be shaken may remain.
korean_text: 이 또 한 번이라 하심은 진동하지 아니하는 것을 영존하게 하기 위하여 진동할 것들 곧 만드신 것들이 변동될 것을 나타내심이라

sentences.original_text: the removal of things that are shaken
that is, things that have been made
in order that the things that cannot be shaken
